m_szDocTitle: 7 Reasons The Australia Solar Market Is So Interesting | CleanTechnica
m_szDocSumamry: 7 Reasons The Australia Solar Market Is So Interesting April 1st, 2015 by Zachary Shahan   There are a handful of solar markets that we have given extra attention to in the past few years: the US, China, Germany, India, and Australia. There are a number of reasons why each of them has gotten so much attention. Below, I’m digging in a bit to why Australia solar * is so fascinating to us and gets so much of our internet ink. 1. Sunshine, Baby! Australia, of course, has a lot of sunshine. Naturally, that boosts its solar energy potential. That isn’t its only card, or else it might not get a dime
